title: HubSpot CRM Organization & Planning
desc: Dedicate time to organizing HubSpot and mapping out the 60-day campaign. Import or input any existing contacts. Create custom properties to track leads.

title: Lead Magnet Content Outline & Initial Writing
desc: Begin creating the lead magnet, a CMMC Level 2 Readiness Checklist tailored for small DoD contractors. Outline key sections and write introduction.

title: Finish Lead Magnet Draft & Network Outreach
desc: Complete the writing of your CMMC readiness checklist with actionable items. Conduct personal outreach to 5-10 network contacts.

title: Design Lead Magnet PDF & Prospect List Building
desc: Polish the lead magnet using Canva to create a clean, branded PDF. Start building a LinkedIn prospect list.

title: HubSpot Landing Page & Email Sequence Setup (Part 1)
desc: Build a landing page for the CMMC checklist in HubSpot Marketing Hub. Write compelling copy and create automated Email #1.

title: Email Sequence Setup (Part 2) & Workflow Automation
desc: Create nurture email sequence with Email #2 and Email #3. Set up HubSpot workflow with automated delays between emails.

title: Optimize LinkedIn Profile & Facebook Setup
desc: Revamp LinkedIn profile with value-packed headline. Create LinkedIn company page. Join 3-5 relevant Facebook groups.

title: ðŸš€ Launch the Lead Magnet Campaign
desc: Go-live day! Publish LinkedIn post announcing the free checklist. Share on Facebook. Start sending connection requests with personalized notes.

title: Begin LinkedIn Outreach & Group Engagement
desc: Send 5-10 new LinkedIn connection requests. Thank-you messages to accepted connections. Introduce yourself in Facebook groups.

title: Content Creation and CRM Maintenance
desc: Draft LinkedIn post on CMMC myths or misconceptions. Repurpose for Facebook. Review HubSpot for new leads and tag properly.

title: LinkedIn Post #2 and Continued Outreach
desc: Publish educational LinkedIn post. Engage with comments for 30-60 min. Send another batch of connection requests.

title: Follow-Up and Lead Nurture
desc: Identify and prioritize hot leads. Send personal emails/LinkedIn messages. Quick follow-up calls to checklist downloaders.

title: Mid-Campaign Review & Adjustment
desc: Review HubSpot landing page analytics and email open/click rates. Assess LinkedIn acceptance rate. Adjust based on results.

title: LinkedIn Engagement and Email Sequence Monitoring
desc: Share industry news with commentary. Monitor email sequence performance. Reach out to initial network contacts (follow-up reminder).

title: Personal Follow-Ups to Hot Leads
desc: Identify hottest prospects who showed interest or clicked scheduling links. Reach out directly to book calls.

title: Thought Leadership Content & Profile Boost
desc: Create long-form LinkedIn Article or detailed post on CMMC compliance. Publish and promote across channels.

title: Midweek Outreach Sprint
desc: Concentrated outreach day. Send another batch of connection invites with varied personalized notes.

title: Leverage Testimonials & Social Proof
desc: Gather testimonials and endorsements from past clients/colleagues. Prepare 1-page case study or success story.

title: Facebook Group Content & Outreach Cadence Review
desc: Make valuable post in Facebook group. Share mini checklist or practical tips. Review overall outreach cadence.

title: Pipeline Review & Offer Refinement
desc: 1/3 through plan. How many discovery calls booked? Evaluate pitch. Refine offer based on early feedback.

title: Email Sequence CTA & Weekend Prep
desc: Earliest leads will receive Email #3 with direct CTA to book call. Be prepared to respond. Prepare for discovery calls.

title: Follow-Up on Completed Calls & Proposals
desc: Send prompt follow-up email after discovery calls. Send initial proposal or quote. Confirm attendance for upcoming calls.

title: Host a Live Q&A or Webinar Planning
desc: Plan a live Q&A or webinar to establish authority. Email interested prospects. Promote on LinkedIn/Facebook.

title: Industry Networking & Referral Building
desc: Reach out to complementary service providers who could refer business. Build referral relationships.

title: Evaluate Facebook vs LinkedIn Effectiveness
desc: Compare effectiveness: LinkedIn - connections grown, leads, calls. Facebook - engagement, group ROI. Adjust allocation.

title: New Lead Magnet or Content Piece
desc: Introduce a second lead magnet or valuable content. Perhaps CMMC Assessment Scorecard. Promote across channels.

title: Final Month Strategy Brainstorm
desc: Reflect on 4 weeks. Which tactics generated most calls? LinkedIn DMs, content posts, email, groups? Plan scaling.

title: Monthly Metrics Review & Celebration
desc: Four weeks down! Review total leads by source, call bookings, proposal rate. Compare to goal. Document learnings.

title: Scale LinkedIn Outreach
desc: If LinkedIn performing well, increase daily connection requests. Continue personalized messaging. Follow up with connections.

title: Mid-Plan Strategy Refinement & Re-engagement
desc: Day 30 - Halfway point. Re-engage cold leads. Identify inactive contacts and reach out with new angle.

title: Offer Limited-Time Consultations
desc: Create sense of urgency. Offer limited free or discounted consultations. Email to leads and promote on social.

title: Leverage Success Stories and Case Studies
desc: Prepare 1-page case study from client win. Highlight challenge, solution, results. Share in emails and LinkedIn.

title: Educational Webinar/Workshop
desc: Host planned webinar or live workshop. Engage attendees, answer questions. Record for later sharing.

title: Final Outreach Blitz
desc: Major outreach push to capture remaining prospects. Last batch of connection requests. Maximize pipeline.

title: Client Conversion Focus
desc: Focus on moving leads to closure. Follow up on open proposals. Address objections. Aim to convert hot leads.

title: Optimize Email and Message Templates
desc: Analyze email open/reply rates, LinkedIn response rates. Optimize best-performing templates and adjust tone.

title: Personal Touches for Prospects
desc: Stand out with personalized video messages using Vidyard/Loom. Send handwritten notes or surprise gifts to top leads.

title: Pipeline Closure Push
desc: All final proposals on table. Push for signatures. Address objections. Prepare contracts. Close before day 60.

title: Celebrate Wins & Gather Testimonials
desc: Celebrate new clients or deals signed. Request testimonials from satisfied prospects. Use for future marketing.

title: Document Systems & Processes
desc: Document what worked: outreach templates, email sequences, LinkedIn approach. Create playbook for replication.

title: Plan Next 60 Days
desc: Based on Month 1 results, plan Month 2. What tactics will you double down on? What new channels will you test?

title: Reflect & Optimize
desc: Final reflection on 60-day journey. Document learnings and ROI by channel. Celebrate effort. Reset for next growth phase.
